description: This file defines a React component 'FileBrowser' that provides UI for browsing files and folders, uploading files via drag-and-drop, and performing file operations such as delete and download within a web application.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to load file items from storage service based on current path.

methods.name: onDrop
methods.description: Handles files dropped or selected for upload, uploads each file and refreshes the file list.

ctags.name: border-2 border-dashed rounded p-6 text-center cursor-pointer ${isDragActive ? "border-primary bg-blue-50" : "border-gray-300"}
ctags.pattern: /^          className={`border-2 border-dashed rounded p-6 text-center cursor-pointer ${isDragActi/

fields.name: className={`border-2 border-dashed rounded p-6 text-center cursor-pointer ${isDragActi/
